text:
This album lists talks that you have recently shared.

For each talk, the numbers on the right indicate the date and time when the the date was shared. Next to it is a field showing your location at the time the talk was shared. 

Select a talk to play it.

If you wish to share a particular talk or add a note to it, slide your finger on the talk right to left. This will bring up a menu that will allow you do these operations.
